Text: One of the best books I have seen on Statistics and that too in color.Thanks MisterBigg.

@rizwan_12 unfortunately the only way to convert it to PDF required a process which doesn't preserve the text as text,,, just images.  I used Acrobat to compress everything as small as possible but with 900+ pages of images, it becomes huge.

Sorry for the large download.  If you find a smaller equivalent please link it here.
